snippet: Donald J. Trump has released an ad on Instagram that shows images of President Obama playing golf and the Clintons dancing against “Jihadi John” and a burning Humvee, all with the caption: “Not under my watch.”
abstract: Donald J. Trump has released an ad on Instagram that shows images of President Obama playing golf and the Clintons dancing against “Jihadi John” and a burning Humvee, all with the caption: “Not under my watch.”

headline.main: Donald Trump Video Juxtaposes Obama Playing Golf With ISIS Violence
